name: MoveMove - Matching Numbers
description:
"It's not like any other game out there" - Kenny Mathers
"Makes you think outside of the box" - JC H.
You vs. 3-digit number, who will win ?!

How to play:
- tap on tiles to move them
- match the green number to win
- avoid matching the red number
- FOCUS!!!

Features:
- relaxing gameplay
- clean and crisp UI
- cool tones
- best score leaderboard
- best time leaderboard
